name: FlyingSpaghettiMonster
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #20

Credits:

https://ildiavolovesterosa.itch.io

https://macaroon.itch.io

h.ttps://investus.itch.io

Controls: (you can also read those in the tutorial)

Right/Left arrows to move

Up arrow to shoot

Tab to toggle the console

Escape to pause

If you died and the score was submitted, but you haven't set your name in the main menu, you can still do it, and it will update in the leaderboard.
